channel.title: Earth, our only home. Make it better.
channel.description: Earth, our only home. Make it better.

item.title: Orangutans are Pongos.
item.description:
Orangutans are Pongos.

Humans are animals. Animals are not all humans. Humans are apes, not monkeys. Orangutans are apes, like us. Orangutans are pongos. We are all one. Get it right!

item.title: Light painting with pixelstick
item.description:
Light painting with pixelstick

More info at thepixelstick.com! We spent the last year building pixelstick, a light painting tool capable of everything from photo-real renders to amazing abstract ribbons. We've improved with every iteration and are excited to finally show off what it can do. Everything was shot by just two slightly sleep deprived guys and one Pixelstick in Brooklyn.

item.title: The World's Most Beautiful Hotel Pool Views
item.description:

item.title: Wild Shape-Shifting Sofa Can Be Whatever You Want It to Be
item.description:
Wild Shape-Shifting Sofa Can Be Whatever You Want It to Be

Carlo Ratti, who founded MIT's forward-thinking Senseable City Lab, has designed a sofa called Lift-Bit. It is on display at La Triennale in Milan, where innumerable furniture-makers showcase their work in an annual design fair. Sofas (and chairs, for that matter) at Salone del Mobile are like fish in an aquarium: plentiful and beautiful, but, after a while, hard to discern.

item.title: Paint With Fire Using This Virtual Reality App
item.description:
Paint With Fire Using This Virtual Reality App

Vocativ uses intelligent technology, smart journalists and the wisdom of the crowd to find story leads and angles no other news organization can.

item.title: Cuba on the Edge of Change
item.description:
Cuba on the Edge of Change

at times can feel like a nation abandoned. The aching disrepair of its cities, the untamed foliage of its countryside, the orphaned coastlines - a half-century of isolation has wrapped the country in decay. Yet few places in the world brim with as much life as Cuba, a contrast drawn sharper amid its faded grandeur.
